name: Flightera Flight Data
description: Flight status, on-time performance and statistics by Flightera

api_methods.name: airlineStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed airline statistics for airlines identified by the provided identifiers. In most cases the list should contain only one entry, unless the ident is ambiguous.
If searched by ident, only one airline is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao must be provided.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the current day's data.

parameters.name: icao
parameters.description: The ICAO code of the airline, must have a length of 4

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airline, as returned by /airline/search

parameters.name: iata
parameters.description: The IATA code of the airline, must have a length of 3

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the latest statistics for the airline with ICAO code AAL?
I need the performance data for the airline identified by the code DAL.
What are the current statistics for the airline with IATA code AA?
Please give me the on-time performance for the airline with ident 12345.
Fetch the detailed statistics for the airline with ICAO code UAL.
I want to know the flight status for the airline with IATA code BA.
Can you show me the statistics for the airline identified by the code LUV?
Get the latest performance data for the airline with ident 67890.
What are the statistics for the airline with IATA code DL?
Provide the current day's statistics for the airline with ICAO code SWA.

api_methods.name: airportDelayDailyStatistics
api_methods.description:
Returns detailed daily delay statistics for an airport identified by the provided identifiers. If searched by ident, only one airport is returned.
One of ident, iata, icao, localID must be provided. Additionally, `dt` and `isDeparture` are required.
Statistics are calculated overnight and represent the data for the specific date.

parameters.name: isDeparture
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the desired statistics are for departures (true) or arrivals (false)

parameters.name: dt
parameters.description: The date for which delay statistics are desired, formatted as "YYYY-MM-DD"

parameters.name: ident
parameters.description: The ident of the airport, as returned by /airport/search

utterances.utterance: What are the departure delay statistics for JFK airport on 2023-10-15?
Can you provide the arrival delay stats for LAX on September 20, 2023?
Show me the departure delays for Heathrow on 2023-11-01.
I need the arrival delay statistics for O'Hare on October 5, 2023.
What are the departure delays for Frankfurt airport on 2023-12-12?
Give me the arrival delay stats for Dubai International on 2023-08-25.
Can you tell me the departure delay statistics for Sydney airport on 2023-09-30?
I want to know the arrival delays for Tokyo Narita on 2023-10-10.
Please provide the departure delay statistics for San Francisco airport on 2023-11-20.
What are the arrival delay stats for Amsterdam Schiphol on 2023-12-01?
